text: The 1993 NCAA Division III Men's Basketball Tournament was the 19th annual single-elimination tournament to determine the national champions of National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) men's Division III collegiate basketball in the United States. For the first time, the championship rounds were contested in Buffalo, New York. Ohio Northern defeated Augustana (IL), 71–68, in the final, earning their first NCAA Division III national title. The Polar Bears (28–2) were coached by Joe Campoli. ==Championship Rounds== *Site: Buffalo, New York ==See also== *1993 NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Tournament *1993 NCAA Division II Men's Basketball Tournament *1993 NCAA Division III Women's Basketball Tournament *1993 NAIA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament ==References== Category:NCAA Division III Men's Basketball Tournament NCAA Men's Division III Basketball Ncaa Tournament
title: 1993 NCAA Division III Men's Basketball Tournament
